Customer Service Representative Job at Pruvia Integrated Limited




        
    

        
        Pruvia Integrated Limited, we are general service merchants with a strong desire to ensure customer satisfaction in the midst of efficient and effective service delivery. As an organization we are driven by the dictum of ‘Impossibility is Nothing’.

PIL was conceived in 2007, as regards to its incorporation and duly registered in 2013 with Corporate Affairs Commission of Nigeria (CAC) with Registration Number RC 1097861. It originated in response to providing world class services and solutions to the society at large and offering an alternative that is satisfactory in areas of our specialty. It has carried out service rendering duties in various states of Nigeria and within the ever bustling business environment of Lagos.

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location: Osogbo, Osun
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Automobile

Job Brief


	We are looking for a customer-oriented service representative who will act as a liaison, provide product/services information, answer questions, and resolve any emerging problems that our customer accounts might face with accuracy and efficiency.
	The target is to ensure excellent service standards, respond efficiently to customer inquiries, and maintain high customer satisfaction.


Responsibilities


	Customer Service Responsibilities list:
	Manage large amounts of incoming phone calls
	Generate sales leads
	Identify and assess customers’ needs to achieve satisfaction
	Build sustainable relationships and trust with customer accounts through open and interactive communication
	Provide accurate, valid, and complete information by using the right methods/tools
	Meet personal/customer service team sales targets and call handling quotas
	Handle customer complaints, provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits; follow up to ensure resolution
	Keep records of customer interactions, process customer accounts, and file documents
	Follow communication procedures, guidelines, and policies
	Take the extra mile to engage customers


Requirements and Skills


	HND / BSc Degree in any relevant field.
	Minimum of 2 years of proven customer support experience or experience as a Client Service Representative
	Track record of over-achieving quota
	Strong phone contact handling skills and active listening
	Familiarity with CRM systems and practices
	Customer orientation and ability to adapt/respond to different types of characters
	Excellent communication and presentation skills
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively
	Proximity to location is key.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 / month

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted for an interview.

title: Job Openings at Taeillo Furniture
content:
Taeillo is a Nigerian Furniture and Lifestyle Brand that designs and manufactures Furniture by harnessing traditional forms, Materials, Local resources in Africa with both local and modern Technology to create premium Urban Furniture pieces.

We believe our little drops of effort will make a mighty Africa by telling our African story with one piece of Furniture at a time. Our Formula is Culture + Design + Technology = Premium African Urban Furniture.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Carpenter

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Carpenter is responsible for cutting, shaping, assembling, and finishing wooden materials to create furniture, fittings, or structural components according to design specifications.


Key Responsibilities


	Measure, cut, and assemble wood and related materials according to drawings or templates.
	Construct, install, and repair furniture, cabinets, doors, frames, and wooden fixtures.
	Operate woodworking machinery such as saws, planers, routers, and sanders
	Collaborate with production team members to meet project deadlines.


Qualifications & Requirements


	SSCE / OND / Trade Test Certificate in Carpentry or Woodwork.
	Minimum of 2–3 years of experience in furniture or wood production.
	Proficient in using woodworking tools and machinery.
	Good understanding of measurements, materials, and joinery techniques.
	Attention to detail and strong craftsmanship skills.
	Ability to work under minimal supervision.


Application Closing Date: 30th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: peopleandculture@taeillo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more information, call us: 08168322372

 

 

2.) Sales Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Description


	The Furniture Sales Executive Associate is responsible for engaging with customers to understand their home furnishing needs, presenting furniture solutions, and closing sales.
	This role involves excellent product knowledge, customer service skills, and the ability to meet sales targets while maintaining showroom standards.


Job Description


	Assist customers in the showroom, identifying their furniture and interior décor needs.
	Meet or exceed individual and team sales targets and performance goals
	Explain features, materials, pricing, and customization options of furniture pieces.
	Recommend suitable products based on customer lifestyle, space, and budget.
	Provide accurate product information, including dimensions, materials, lead times, and care instructions.
	Prepare and process sales orders, and invoices accurately using the CRM software.
	Follow up with customers post-sale for feedback, delivery coordination, and repeat business.
	Collaborate with the delivery/logistics team to schedule customer deliveries.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration or relevant fields
	At least 4 - 6 years of proven sales or customer service experience in retail or furniture sales.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Sales and Negotiation skills
	Customer Relationship Management skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Experience in the interior design or furniture industry is a plus.


Pay
N150,000.00 - N250,000.00 per month (+commission).

Application Closing Date: 25th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: peopleandculture@taeillo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Finance Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dynamic Finance Officer who will be responsible for managing financial processes and ensuring the efficient flow of financial information within the company.
	The role requires maintaining financial records, supporting budget preparation, monitoring financial performance, ensuring compliance with relevant regulations, and providing financial reports to senior management.
	This position will be critical in driving financial planning, analysis, and decision-making to support the company's manufacturing operations and business objectives.


Responsibilities


	Monitor manufacturing costs and expenses, identifying areas for cost reduction or process improvement.
	Analyze variances between actual performance and budgeted targets, providing recommendations for corrective actions.
	Oversee the allocation of overheads and fixed costs within the production process.
	Ensure the company maintains sufficient cash flow to meet operational requirements, including vendor payments, salaries, and other liabilities.
	Monitor accounts receivable and accounts payable to ensure prompt and accurate collection and payment.
	Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal tax regulations, including preparation of tax returns and management of audits.
	Coordinate with external auditors to ensure the company’s financial records are accurate and compliant.
	Oversee inventory valuations and ensure accurate financial reporting of manufacturing assets.
	Continuously review financial and accounting processes to ensure they are effective and efficient.
	Propose improvements to the existing financial management systems to reduce costs, enhance productivity, and increase profitability.
	Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements and reports, including profit and loss accounts, balance sheets, and cash flow statements.
	Analyze financial data and provide insights to improve financial performance and cost efficiency in the manufacturing process.
	Ensure accurate recording and reporting of financial transactions in line with company policies and accounting standards.
	Assist in the preparation and management of the company’s annual budget.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field.
	4 - 7 years of experience in a finance-related role, preferably in a manufacturing environment.
	A professional certification (ACCA, CPA, CIMA) is compulsory.
	Experience with financial software (SAP, QuickBooks, or ERP systems).
	Strong understanding of cost accounting, manufacturing processes, and financial reporting.


Salary
Competitive.

Application Closing Date: 25th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: peopleandculture@taeillo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Supervisory Store Officer (Administration) Job at Peoples Democratic Party (PDP)




        
    

        
        Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) is the largest opposition political party, and one of the two major contemporary political parties in Nigeria, along with its main rival, the All Progressives Congress. Its policies generally lie towards the center-right of the political spectrum. It won every presidential election between 1999 and 2011. Until the 2015 elections, it was the governing party in the Fourth Republic, although sometimes amid a few controversial electoral circumstances.

We require experienced, dynamic, competent and career oriented persons for immediate employment in the capacity below:

Job Position: Supervisory Store Officer (Administration)

Directorate: Administration

	A suitable candidate for this position must possess a minimum of Bachelor's Degree in relevant discipline with a minimum of 5 years requisite job experience in similar position and institution.
	Knowledge of office administration and personnel management will be an added advantage.
	Interested persons should have abilities to work under pressure and with minimum supervision.

Interested and qualified candidates should send their Curriculum Vitae with a brief note of their understanding of the job they are applying for to: pdprecruitment2025@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
